person module¶

class person.Person(name, age, email)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class to represent a person with basic attributes such as name, age, and email.

name¶

The name of the person.

Type:

str

age¶

The age of the person (must be non-negative).

Type:

int

__email¶

The email of the person (validated to ensure it contains ‘@’).

Type:

str

get_email()[source]¶

Returns the person’s email address.

get_email()[source]¶

Returns the email address of the person.

Returns:

The email address of the person.

Return type:

str
